articles.description: Real Madrid's exit from the Champions League at the hands of Arsenal on Wednesday has put the future of manager Carlo Ancelotti and his players in the spotlight.
articles.title: Real Madrid: What next for Spanish giants and boss Carlo Ancelotti?

articles.description: On the night Arsenal secure their place in the Champions League semi-finals, BBC Sport looks at what has been called a "statement win"
articles.title: Real Madrid 1-2 Arsenal (agg 1-5): Arsenal reach Champions League semi-finals with 'statement' win

articles.description: BBC Sport predict who will win the 2024-25 Champions League as Arsenal, Barcelona, Paris St-Germain and Inter Milan book their semi-final spots.
articles.title: Champions League 2025 winner predictions: Who do BBC Sport pundits and journalists think will win?

articles.description: Winger Jacob Murphy scored one goal and assisted another as Newcastle thrashed Crystal Palace 5-0 in the Premier League on Monday night.
articles.title: Jacob Murphy: Does Newcastle winger deserve place in the England squad?

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Inter Milan vs Bayern Munich in the UEFA Champions League
articles.title: Inter Milan vs Bayern Munich

articles.description: Arsenal see off Real Madrid to reach the Champions League semi-finals -  ensuring the top five finishers in the Premier League will qualify for next season's competition.
articles.title: Champions League semi-finals: preview, fixtures & route to the final

articles.description: Gabon international Aaron Boupendza has died at the age of 28 after reportedly falling from a building in China.
articles.title: Aaron Boupendza: Gabon international dies aged 28

articles.description: Delhi Capitals go top of the IPL table after beating Rajasthan Royals in the first super over of the 2025 tournament.
articles.title: IPL 2025: Delhi Capitals beat Rajasthan Royals in first super over

articles.description: Promoter Eddie Hearn is confident Tyson Fury v Anthony Joshua could still happen, and says all it takes is a direct message on social media between the fighters.
articles.title: Fury v Joshua: Promoter Eddie Hearn says fight could be agreed by text message

articles.description: The UK Supreme Court's ruling could have wide implications, including in sport.
articles.title: Supreme Court gender ruling: What does it mean for sport?
